Nightlight::

Nightlight's shone up when she feel his hand in her cheek "I love you 
too, Rodimus"

And she did a slight kiss in his lips.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> Rodimus takes her hand, kissing the palm. He started to walk with 
her again.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: How about we have some deseart in my quarters and 
relax a bit. Then I'll walk you to your room and we can call it a 
night.
> 
> He placed his right hand on her left cheek.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: Just know one thing Nightlight, I love you.
